mapper.select: SELECT revision_no, prj_no, rev_comment, rev_file_name, TO_CHAR(sys_reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS sys_reg_date_str FROM PRJ_REVISION_BASE WHERE prj_no = #{prj_no} ORDER BY revision_no DESC
SELECT revision_no, prj_no, rev_comment, rev_file_name, TO_CHAR(sys_reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS sys_reg_date_str FROM PRJ_REVISION_BASE WHERE prj_no = #{prj_no} AND rev_file_name = #{rev_file_name}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRJ_REVISION_BASE(revision_no, prj_no, rev_comment, rev_file_name, sys_reg_date) VALUES (#{revision_no}, #{prj_no}, #{rev_comment}, #{rev_file_name}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE PRJ_REVISION_BASE SET revision_no = #{revision_no}, prj_no = #{prj_no}, rev_comment = #{rev_comment}, rev_file_name = #{rev_file_name} WHERE revision_no = #{revision_no}
